abstract: Turkish Parliament passes highly controversial bill that would impose harsher punishments on participants of unauthorized protests and would empower police to use more violent measures against them.
lead_paragraph: Lawmakers passed a bill making it easier to detain people to uphold public order and giving the police more leeway to investigate.

headline.main: Turkish Parliament Expands Police Powers and Cracks Down on Demonstrations
headline.print_headline: Turkey Expands Powers of Police During Protests

snippet: Lawmakers passed a bill making it easier to detain people to uphold public order and giving the police more leeway to investigate.

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
keywords.name: subject
